"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "patient", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Patient"}, {"fieldname": "patient_name", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Patient Name"}, {"fieldname": "patient_sex", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Gender"}, {"fieldname": "patient_age", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Age"}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "encounter_date", "print_hide": 0, "align": "left", "label": "Date"}, {"fieldname": "practitioner", "print_hide": 0, "align": "left", "label": "Doctor"}, {"fieldname": "medical_department", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Department"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "drug_prescription", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Drug Prescription", "visible_columns": [{"fieldname": "drug_code", "print_width": "", "print_hide": 0}, {"fieldname": "qty", "print_width": "", "print_hide": 0}, {"fieldname": "dosage", "print_width": "", "print_hide": 0}, {"fieldname": "period", "print_width": "", "print_hide": 0}, {"fieldname": "route", "print_width": "", "print_hide": 0}]}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "Doctor's Sign __________________________________
\n\nFadlan Soo noqoshada waa 14 cisho"}]
html:
PATIENT MEDICAL

PRESCRIPTION

ID:

{{doc.patient}}

Age:

{{frappe.db.get_value("Patient" , doc.patient , "p_age" )}}

Doctor:

{{doc.ref_practitioner}}

Name:

{{doc.patient_name}}

sex:

{{frappe.db.get_value("Patient" , doc.patient , "sex" )}}

Date:

{{doc.transaction_date}}

{% for i in doc.items %} {% endfor %}
# DRUG TYPE QTY FREQUENCY ROUTE INSTRACTION
1 {{i.item_code}} {{i.uom}} 3 1 {{i.route or ""}} {{i.instraction or ""}}

Signature: ________________________

Soo Laabashada Bunkaanka Waa {{frappe.db.get_value("Healthcare Settings" , "Healthcare Settings" ,"valid_days")}} Maalin Guahooda.
